description:
The best way to fit in at a new school? Start a band! Anon has just transferred to Haneoka Girls’ Academy where girl bands are all the rage. But she started school late, so there aren’t many girls left to recruit. Then she meets her first friend and Haneoka’s misfit, Tomori, who’s hesitant to join. Still, Anon is determined to persuade Tomori and experience the true power of friendship and music.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: POV
tags.description: Point of View; features scenes shown from the perspective of the series protagonist.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

node.description:
[Website](https://bang-dream.com/mygo) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bang_dream_mygo) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@bang_dream_mygo/) | [TikTok](https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSdACoa3S/) | [BiliBili](https://space.bilibili.com/1459104794)

MyGO!!!!! is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Hina Youmiya](https://anilist.co/staff/205892/Hina-Youmiya) (as [Tomori Takamatsu](https://anilist.co/character/302095/Tomori-Takamatsu)) on vocals
- [Rin Tateishi](https://anilist.co/staff/302096/Rin-Tateishi) (as [Anon Chihaya](https://anilist.co/character/302094/Anon-Chihaya)) on rhythm guitar
- [Hina Aoki](https://anilist.co/staff/289756/Hina-Aoki) (as [Raana Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/302092/Raana-Kaname)) on lead guitar
- [Mika Kohinata](https://anilist.co/staff/302097/Mika-Kohinata) (as [Soyo Nagasaki](https://anilist.co/character/302093/Soyo-Nagasaki)) on bass
- [Coco Hayashi](https://anilist.co/staff/124857/Coco-Hayashi) (as [Taki Shiina](https://anilist.co/character/302091/Taki-Shiina)) on drums

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asuka_oda)

A lyricist affiliated with Elements Garden.

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hitomiogawa_) Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/197642). Hitomi Ogawa is a scriptwriter.
**Hayashi Shouko** is a Japanese photographer and director of photography.
